Title: Long live the victory of Chairman Mao's proletarian revolutionary line
Designer: Revolutionary Committee of Zhejiang Worker-Peasant-Soldier Fine Arts Academy (浙江工农兵美术大学革委会)
Publisher: Zhejiang gongnongbing huabao she (浙江工农兵画报社)
Notes: The image of the young Mao is based on a photograph taken by Edgar Snow in Yan'an, 1936.
